General.Name: MGT Capital Investments Inc
General.Description: MGT Capital Investments, Inc. engages in cryptocurrency mining business in the United States. It also leases space to other bitcoin miners; and provides hosting services for owners of mining equipment. The company was incorporated in 1977 and is headquartered in Raleigh, North Carolina.
General.Address: 150 Fayetteville Street, Raleigh, NC, United States, 27601
